entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:01 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
